dynGuiComponents.text: Welcome to UltraSonic! The app is currently not configured. After you've set up your personal server (available from subsonic.org), please click Add Server in Settings to connect to it.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: you can easily stream or download music from your home computer to your Android phone using the Subsonic media streamer. The Subsonic server software requires additional configuration separate from UltraSonic. For more information or to install the Subsonic server software on your computer, please visit

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: . The basic version of Subsonic is free. When you first install Subsonic, the premium features are available for 30 days so you can try them out before deciding to upgrade. Click

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: By default, UltraSonic is not configured. Once you've set up your own server, please go to Settings and change the configuration so that it connects to your own computer.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: If you are pleased with UltraSonic, please click "Donate" to help further development. This donation is separate from the Subsonic server software and does not grant you access to the premium features of Subsonic.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.Button
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: PayPal - The safer, easier way to pay online!

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: To submit feature requests or file bug reports, please visit the UltraSonic for Android

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.contentDescription: . Source code for UltraSonic is available at
